title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 585.1 - Applicability of this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 585.1 - Applicability of this part

State Regulations

This Part shall govern vehicular and pedestrian traffic, parking, and safety upon all highways, streets, roads, and sidewalks owned or
maintained by State University of New York and controlled by the State

University College at Cortland, and shall apply to faculty, staff, students, visitors, and all other persons upon such premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
585.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
